## The data

```{r}
#| label: load packages

library(tidyverse)
```

Describe the data in text for the reader.

```{r}
#| load data

# load clinical data for plotting
clinical_data <- read.table("../data/clinical_data.tsv", sep = "\t", header = T)

```

The patient samples are classified with pam50. The distribution of pam50 among patients is shown in the plot below.

```{r}
barplot <- ggplot(data = clinical_data, 
                  mapping = aes(x = pam50)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = pam50)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  labs(title = "Distribution of patients in data based on pam50 classification",
       x = "pam50 categories",
       y = "No of patients")
barplot

ggsave("../plots/pam50distribution.png", barplot, height = 4, width = 6)
```
